title: S16 Ep36: Dark Air w/ Living Legend, Terry Carnation
itunes:title: Dark Air w/ Living Legend, Terry Carnation
description:
Darkness Radio presents Dark Air with living legend Terry Carnation

Dave & Tim are visited by long time, legendary paranormal radio host, Terry Carnation of Dark Air radio. 

After a long absence, Dark Air returns everywhere on April 1 for 14 brand new, compelling journeys into the realm of the supernatural. The boys discuss some supernatural news, Terry's history and personal ghost story of being raised by a spectral mother and so much more! All this PLUS a brand new Theater of the Mind.
Rainn Wilson stars in this fictional darkly comedic podcast, Dark Air, that explores the on and off-air life of Terry Carnation – a late-night talk-radio show host who deals with bizarre topics, outrageous callers... and gets caught up in a mystery of his own.

·Season 1 of “Dark Air with Terry Carnation” premieres on April 1st and consists of 14 weekly episodes. Listen to Dark Air here: https://apple.co/39iwsYN

Follow Terry Carnation on social media: @TerryCarnation & @DarkAir
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
